# Climate_Change_and_sclerophyllus_forest
Methodology used for the elaboration of the scientific article entitled:
"The Time of Emergence (ToE) of the Andean Mediterranean sclerophyllous forest of Quillaja saponaria (Mol.) and Lithraea caustica (mol.) Hox. & Arn" (https://doi.org/10.1016/j.foreco.2023.121169)

- The historical climate data used can be obtained from the web page ("https://www.cr2.cl/downloads/cr2met/")
- The luebert and pliscoff vegetation belts are available from follow link ("https://www.ide.cl/index.php/flora-y-fauna/item/1524-pisos-vegetacionales-luebert-pliscoff-2017")
